price: Those whose efforts in the life of this world are wasted, while they think that they are doing well[54].”
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ ضَلَّ سَعۡيُهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَهُمۡ يَحۡسَبُونَ أَنَّهُمۡ يُحۡسِنُونَ صُنۡعًا
footnotes: [54] For they follow other than their Lord’s path, and justify their deviant actions until they finally believe that they are on the right path.
